vs-divider/position.description: Determine the position of the text or icon.

vs-divider/color.description: Change the color of the line and the text.

vs-divider/icon.description: Add an icon instead of the text.

vs-divider/borderStyle.description: Determines the type of line in the component.

vs-divider/iconPack.description: Icon Pack to be used. If not set, icon will default to Material Icons. ex. FA4 uses fa or fas, FA5 uses fas, far, or fal.
